@graph.caption: Tahini Brownies & A Little Guide To Vegan Baking

@graph.name: Vegan Brownies - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: You won't believe how delicious these vegan brownies are! They're incredibly fudgy, moist, and chocolatey. Plus, they're SO easy to make!

@graph.headline: Vegan Brownies
@graph.keywords: how to make vegan brownies fudgy,tahini brownies,vegan brownies,vegan brownies recipe,vegan brownies with applesauce,vegan brownies with chocolate chips

@graph.name: Vegan Brownies
@graph.description: These vegan brownies are incredibly fudgy and SO chocolatey. Plus, they are a little bit healthier than most brownie recipes.
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg ((1 tablespoon ground flaxseeds + 3 tablespoons of water))

recipeInstructions.text: Make the flax egg: Grind one tablespoon of flax seeds in a food processor or use store-bought ground flax seeds. Add 3 tablespoons of water and set aside to thicken for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the flax egg: Grind one tablespoon of flax seeds in a food processor or use store-bought ground flax seeds. Add 3 tablespoons of water and set aside to thicken for about 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Then make the batter: Combine all ingredients (including the flax egg) in a large bowl and stir with a wooden spoon until well combined. Lightly grease a baking tray (10" x 8") and pour in the batter.  Spread evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Then make the batter: Combine all ingredients (including the flax egg) in a large bowl and stir with a wooden spoon until well combined. Lightly grease a baking tray (10" x 8") and pour in the batter.  Spread evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Put two tablespoons of tahini on top of the brownie batter and swirl with the tip of a butter knife. Sprinkle with the chopped cashews and bake for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Put two tablespoons of tahini on top of the brownie batter and swirl with the tip of a butter knife. Sprinkle with the chopped cashews and bake for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the brownies cool down in the baking tray. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or on the stove top. Drizzle on top of the brownies. Cut them into 12-18 pieces, depending on how big you want them. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Let the brownies cool down in the baking tray. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or on the stove top. Drizzle on top of the brownies. Cut them into 12-18 pieces, depending on how big you want them. Enjoy!
